text: Devit garima, Ikiavɨra Itir God uan anɨngagharim Usa gingezɨ an areme. Ezɨ Devit atari. Ezɨ me danganir kam dɨbora ghaze, “God Uan Anɨngagharim Usa Ginge,” egha datɨrɨghɨn me uaghan kamaghɨra a dɨboravɨra iti.13:11 Akar kam, “datɨrɨghɨn,” a datɨrɨghɨn itir dughiam mɨgeir puvatɨ. A gumazir akɨnafarir kam osirizimɨn dughiam mɨgei.
